title: Understanding Point Mode
text: Point mode allows you to select cells directly when creating formulas, reducing the chance of errors.

title: Benefits of Point Mode
text: Using point mode can help you avoid mistakes that might occur when typing cell references manually.

hintAnswer: to create formulas without worrying about typographical errors when entering cell references
title: Purpose of Point Mode
text: What is the main purpose of using point mode in spreadsheets?
choices: to create formulas without worrying about typographical errors when entering cell references
to make the worksheet easier to print
to see the order of operations more easily
